name: Highway Ride
description:
Highway Ride is an endless game with an action set on a one-way highway.
Your goal is to overtake vehicles and cover the longest distance during the game.

Features
  • Traffic volume depends on the distance traveled.
  • Environment is generated in real time indefinitely.
Controls

Swipe left or right on the screen to change lanes or use the horizontal axis on any controller.

Art Style

Low-poly technique optimized for any platform with a slight road curve shader. 3D Assets by Synty Studios.

Music & Sound

Simple sounds and music based on a free copyright license. The song is Get Stupid (Infraction).

Development Plan
  • Adding coins to collect and buying cars.
  • Adding a online ranking with the best score.
Feedback

Share in the comments what you think about this mini-game and don't forget to rate and add to your collection if you like it.
